scripts.build: browserify webmap.js -o public/javascripts/bundle.js & cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css public/stylesheets/leaflet.css
scripts.bundle: browserify webmap.js | terser --compress --mangle > public/javascripts/bundle.js & cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.css public/stylesheets/leaflet.css
